name: BOS: Billionaire Simulator
description:
Welcome to BOS: Billionaire Simulator! A game where you can become anyone you wish. A world of unlimited possibilities awaits its hero.

Everyone wants to be a lion, not everyone can become one. Be a chooser not a beggar. Make your own rules and break them to pave a way to success. Become a billionaire and develop your own economic system.

Take a first step towards reigning over the world and be successful in every venture. Be bold, take chances and realize your most adventurous ideas in life and see what happens. A game that is better than life, that is faster than life. Attract luck and increase profit. Never stop on your way up.

Begin your journey as a rickshaw and climb up the ladder to become a self-made billionaire. From now on, the only way out is forward. Shoot for the stars and never settle for less. Become an emperor of your life and see others follow in your footsteps.

Explore BOS: Billionaire Simulator and become a boss of your life and world!
